Updating your email address associated with your social media accounts is a great idea, especially if you've changed your email address or want to use a new one. Here's how to update your email address on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn:

**Facebook:**

1. Log in to your Facebook account on a computer or mobile device.
2. Click on the downward arrow in the top-right corner of the Facebook homepage.
3. Click on "Settings" from the dropdown menu.
4. Click on "Account Settings" from the left-hand menu.
5. Click on "Contact" from the General Account Settings page.
6. Click on "Edit" next to "Email" and enter your new email address.
7. Enter your Facebook password to confirm the change.
8. Click "Save Changes."

**Instagram:**

1. Open the Instagram app on your mobile device.
2. Tap the profile icon (represented by a person) in the bottom-right corner of the screen.
3. Tap the three horizontal lines (Settings) on the top-right corner of your profile page.
4. Tap "Account" from the dropdown menu.
5. Tap "Edit Profile."
6. Tap the "Email" field and enter your new email address.
7. Tap "Done" in the top-right corner of the screen to save the changes.

**LinkedIn:**

1. Log in to your LinkedIn account on a computer or mobile device.
2. Click on your profile picture in the top-right corner of the LinkedIn homepage.
3. Click on "Settings & Privacy" from the dropdown menu.
4. Click on "Account" from the left-hand menu.
5. Click on "Email & password" from the Account page.
6. Click on the pencil icon next to "Email address."
7. Enter your new email address and click "Save."

**Additional Tips:**

* Make sure you have access to the new email address you're adding, as you may need to verify the change.
* If you're using two-factor authentication (2FA) on any of these platforms, you may need to update your 2FA settings as well.
* Consider updating your email address on other online accounts, such as your email service provider, bank, and credit card companies, to ensure you receive important notifications.
* You may want to set up email forwarding from your old email address to your new one to ensure you don't miss any important emails.

By updating your email address on these platforms, you'll ensure you receive important notifications and stay connected with your online communities.
